oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The use of organic cereal seed in selected European countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thommen, Andreas
Schmid, Otto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: As a part of the Workpackage 5 of the EU-Organic Revision Project, the national reports on derogation for the use of non-organic seeds of the year 2004 have been analysed and compared to the total acre-age cultivated. The results for cereal seeds show big differences between the states regarding the share of non-organic seeds in cultivation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Thommen, Andreas and Schmid, Otto (2006) The use of organic cereal seed in selected European countries. Paper at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
